item.title: Black Ops 6: How to Get the Mega Stuffy Pet
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Stuffed Toys Locations on Terminus Island
    • Stuffed Rabbit in the Control Center
    • Stuffed Monkey at the Sea Tower
    • Stuffed Elephant in the Mining Tunnel
    • Stuffed Bear at the Bio Lab
    • Stuffed Duck at the Shipwreck
    • Stuffed Giraffe at Crab Island
  • How to Make Mega Stuffy

Mega Stuffy is the ultimate amalgamation of stuffed animals that can be collected in Black Ops 6 Zombies ’ Terminus map to unlock a new pet and ally that will revive players and disrupt zombies, but how does one find this secret on the dreaded horrors of Terminus Island?

Black Ops 6 ’s Terminus map holds many secrets, and Mega Stuffy is perhaps its silliest one, yet it’s not without its uses. Mega Stuffy is going to be a collectathon, so gather some resources and get ready to explore Terminus Island to pick up some stuffed and cuddly animal toys.

All Stuffed Toys Locations on Terminus Island

There are a total of 6 stuffed animals that can be found throughout Terminus Island, and players will need to collect them all if they want to unlock Mega Stuffy. While players can shoot each of the stuffed toys, it’s recommended to pick them up with the interact button, just so players can obtain more loot for doing so. Here’s every stuffed animal location:

Stuffed Rabbit in the Control Center

Enter into the Control Center, and to the left of Stamin-Up and hiding inside a locker close to the armory, players can find a stuffed rabbit.

Stuffed Monkey at the Sea Tower

Between the Engineering Room and the Sea Tower, players can find a stuffed monkey hiding behind the metal fence when facing the Engineering Room from the Sea Tower and looking to the left.

Stuffed Elephant in the Mining Tunnel

Inside the Mining Tunnel found by PhD Flopper, and to the left of the GobbleGum Machine, players can find a stuffed elephant hiding beside a wooden palette.

Stuffed Bear at the Bio Lab

Between the Armor Wall-Buy and the Crafting Bench in the Bio Lab, players can find a stuffed bear that will be set on the floor when facing the center of the Bio Lab.

Stuffed Duck at the Shipwreck

Take a boat and head West of Terminus Island to find the Shipwreck. Once on the crashed ship, players can look to the right to see a trash heap, where a stuffed toy of a duck waits inside to be collected.

Stuffed Giraffe at Crab Island

Take the boat South of Terminus Island to find Crab Island, where once ashore, the stuffed giraffe is hiding beside a lamp that is located between the weapon wall-buy and the Crafting Table.

How to Make Mega Stuffy

Once all the stuffed animals have been collected, head back to the Living Quarters where Juggernog can be acquired, and then on every bunk bed there will be one of the stuffed animals that were picked up. Interact with any one of them to see them drop a bundle of Lethal and Tactical Equipment, before flying up into the center of the Living Quarters to become Mega-Stuffy, which is an amalgamation of all the stuffed animals combined into one.

Mega-Stuffy acts a lot like the Parasite enemy and will fly around and shoot zombies. However, the damage it deals is extremely low, but it can knock zombies down which is useful for keeping them away. Mega-Stuffy also has a unique ability to revive players who are downed, but Mega-Stuffy doesn’t last all that long and isn’t the fastest at following the player who created it.

item.title: Sacred M Soul Awakening Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
Sacred M Soul Awakening is a free-to-play mobile MMORPG that, like other similar games, has a large open world, many quests, and various loot. The game is very rich in content, so in the first minutes of the playthrough, you will face several different bosses. However, the battles with them are simple; you don't even have to do anything because the game has a fully automatic mode. Over time, opponents can become more challenging, so we recommend redeeming Sacred M Soul Awakening codes to get free rewards.

All Sacred M Soul Awakening Codes

Working Sacred M Soul Awakening Codes

Expired Sacred M Soul Awakening Codes

Sacred M Soul Awakening has no expired codes.

How to Redeem Codes in Sacred M Soul Awakening

As in Roblox games, redeeming codes in Sacred M Soul Awakening is straightforward; you don't even need to go through the tutorial. However, the interface in the game is a bit confusing, so to help you, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Sacred M Soul Awakening .

  • Open Sacred M Soul Awakening and look in the top left corner of the screen. Click the Benefits button.
  • Next, go to the Pack Exchange tab.
  • In the field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Claim Rewards.

How to Get More Sacred M Soul Awakening Codes

For mobile games, it can be difficult to find codes that work, and even more so for PC games. Therefore, to help you get rewards, we create code guides and update them daily. In order not to lose our site, please pin this page in your browser by pressing Ctrl + D.

Sacred M Soul Awakening is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Dragon Ball Legendary Forces Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
Dragon Ball Legendary Forces is an anime-based adventure RPG where you can explore the world and fight a bunch of enemies that will get in your way. You can also engage in grinding for resources and currency to upgrade your character and be ready for even more difficult challenges.

Just like in other Roblox games, you can redeem Dragon Ball Legendary Forces codes that offer generous rewards. Among them are a lot of useful resources and other things that you will definitely need, so don't neglect them.

All Dragon Ball Legendary Forces Codes

Working Dragon Ball Legendary Forces Codes

  • 14kLikesWow! - Redeem this code to get 600,000 Zenis, and six Races Rerolls.
  • EVENTENDED - Redeem this code to get 600,000 Zenis, and 1,800 seconds of double XP.
  • Follow_Knuppsama - Redeem this code to get 250,000 Zenis, and three Races Rerolls.
  • Follow_ISonDevISI - Redeem this code to get 300,000 Zenis, and 1,200 seconds of double XP.
  • SubscribeToVenonSabio! - Redeem this code to get 500,000 Zenis.

Expired Dragon Ball Legendary Forces Codes

  • SORRYFORDELAYOF11K
  • OMGITS10K
  • 8800LikesTy
  • 8300Wingslompsons
  • SorryForDelayOf7150
  • UPDATE10.5
  • UpdateSoon
  • Finally6900TyGuys
  • WeReached6600
  • LetsShare
  • 6kLikesGuys
  • 5750Code!
  • UPDATE10RELEASED
  • 15MIN2XPP
  • 5500SuperCool
  • UPDATE9!
  • HelloFebruary!
  • corteiocabelo115k!
  • MRBEAST5K
  • 2MVisits!
  • THISISOURYEAR2024
  • Almost31st
  • ApologizeCode
  • 4400UpdateSoon
  • UPDATE9!
  • SubscribeToVenonSabio!

Redeeming Dragon Ball Legendary Forces codes will be equally useful for both beginners and experienced players. With the rewards you receive, you can progress much faster in the game, or collect resources for the desired upgrades or purchases, so be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes for Dragon Ball Legendary Forces

The process of redeeming Dragon Ball Legendary Forces codes is not complicated, but finding the right option is a bit more tricky than in other Roblox games. If you don't know how it works, use our step-by-step guide:

  • Launch Dragon Ball Legendary Forces .
  • Press the M key to open the new menu.
  • In the menu that opens, interact with the first button in the column which says Settings.
  • Now, in the Settings menu, interact with the button labeled Codes. It's the last button on the list.
  • This will open the redemption menu. Here you will see an input field where you have to enter one of the active codes mentioned above.
  • Finally, press Enter to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Dragon Ball Legendary Forces Codes

If you're looking for more Roblox codes, be sure to check out the game's official social media. Here, in the original sources, you can find codes among other content and news posted by the developers, so be careful not to miss anything.

  • Official Dragon Ball Legendary Forces game page.
  • Official Dragon Ball Legendary Forces Discord server.

item.title: Black Ops 6: How to Find Mr. Peaks’ Bowling Minigame in Liberty Falls
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Where to Find All Mr. Peaks Bowling Shoes
    • Bowling Shoes #1
    • Bowling Shoes #2
    • Bowling Shoes #3
    • Bowling Shoes #4
    • Bowling Shoes #5
  • How to Beat Mr. Peak’s Bowling Mini-Game

Those who dare to enter into Black Ops 6 ’s Zombies map Liberty Falls will find themselves involved in a fun mystery, and a chance to go bowling. Liberty Falls is filled with secrets and unique easter eggs, and one of its best involves a bowling mini-game that might just earn players a free Perk-a-Cola depending on how skilled they are at throwing a bowling ball into some zombies.

Yet, how does one acquire the bowling ball and accept Mr. Peaks’ bowling challenge in the first place? Luckily, it’s rather simple, and Black Ops 6 players can load into Liberty Falls and start the hunt for 5 pairs of bowling shoes that won’t be too hard to find.

Where to Find All Mr. Peaks Bowling Shoes

In order to activate the Bowling Mini-Game in Liberty Falls, players need to find and shoot 5 pairs of bowling shoes that can be found in various locations around the map. These locations will remain the same in every game, and players can shoot them with just a standard weapon, it does not have to be Pack-a-Punched. Here are all 5 locations for the bowling shoes:

Bowling Shoes #1

The first pair of bowling shoes players can find will be inside the Pump & Pay, which is located just at the spawn area. Look inside the open barrier where the bowling shoes will be waiting on the till next to the cash register.

Bowling Shoes #2

The second pair of bowling shoes is found in Riverside, following across the street opposite Olly’s Comics to reach Frank’s Hardware, a shop that has an open barrier. Inside the shop, look to the right shelf where the bowling shoes are hidden in darkness.

Bowling Shoes #3

Follow up to Hill Street, and there will be a staircase that takes players up to a zombie spawn wall. Look inside this building to find the bowling shoes underneath the armchair on the right.

Bowling Shoes #4

Head to the very back of the Cemetery next to the Armor Wall-Buy, and looking out through the barbed wire hole in the wall, a pair of bowling shoes can be seen in the distance out of the map dangling on a tree branch.

Bowling Shoes #5

Enter into West Main Street just after Fuller’s Liberty Lanes and look into the window of the building on the right. Inside is a funeral service, and to the left, there will be a pair of bowling shoes on the casket.

How to Beat Mr. Peak’s Bowling Mini-Game

After players have shot all 5 pairs of bowling shoes, they will instantly be teleported into Fuller’s Liberty Lanes, the bowling alley, but the doors are locked and Mr. Peaks will be dancing, as will zombies and Manglers. Players now have 2 minutes to pick up a bowling ball found in the lanes and then throw it with Left-Click/RT/R2 (or charge it up for the ball to go faster) and hit the zombies that walk back and forth across the lanes. The objective here is to hit as many zombies as possible with the infinite-spawning bowling balls.

Players can get an in-game trophy from Mr. Peaks after 2 minutes, and they can either obtain a bronze trophy, silver trophy, or gold trophy, depending on how many zombies they managed to hit in total. Simply approach the trophy and interact with it to receive an abundance of loot. Players can receive different rarities of weapons, equipment, and even perks if they bowl a good game.

item.title: Roblox: Power-Up Soccer Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
Power-Up Soccer is a great soccer simulator with unusual but cool mechanics, dynamic gameplay, and a bunch of interesting features that are not found in other similar Roblox games. Here you can play your favorite position in various football matches alone or with friends.

To unlock more new features and customization items, you can redeem Power-Up Soccer codes. Each code offers unique rewards that will definitely come in handy sooner or later, so don't neglect it.

All Power-Up Soccer Codes

Working Power-Up Soccer Codes

  • KICKOFF1024 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • SPINNER21X - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • EMOTEZ46 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • FRAMEX390 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • SKILLQ17 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • GOALHIT558 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • PASSUP927 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • FOUL19XY - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • DANCEX37 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • SAVE421 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • SPEEDGO2 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • GOAL999Q - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Expired Power-Up Soccer Codes

There are currently no expired Power-Up Soccer codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for Power-Up Soccer

As with most other Roblox games, redeeming Power-Up Soccer codes won't take long, especially if you've done it before. If you have no idea how it works, here's a step-by-step guide:

  • Launch Power-Up Soccer .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. Here, under the currency counter, you will see three buttons placed in a row. Among them, interact with the first one which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Redeem button next to it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the working codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification “You redeemed code” below the redemption menu and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Power-Up Soccer Codes

If the rewards you have received are not enough, and you want to get more Power-Up Soccer codes, you can find them on the official social networks of the game. Visit them and carefully check the latest posts, and this way, you may find Roblox codes somewhere among them:

  • Official Power-Up Soccer Roblox group.
  • Official Power-Up Soccer game page.
  • Official Power-Up Soccer Discord server.
  • Official Power-Up Soccer X account.
